text: Yithi(Muhammad):“Ingabasizakubizakwabanyengaphandle koAllâh, (sibize kwizithixo) ezingenakusenza nto ilungileyo zingekhe zisenze nabubi, siza kujibilika, sibuye umva Esakugqiba ukusikhokela uAllâh? Sibe njengalowo uShaytân amenze waphambuka emhlabeni edidekile, abahlobo bakhe bemmemelela kwisiKhokelo, (besithi): “Yiza kuthi!” Yithi: “Inene isiKhokelo sika-Allâh siso kuphela isiKhokelo, yaye siyalelwe ukuba sizinikele kwiNkosi yamaphakade”
